entry.title: It's always interesting to see what one keeps ...
entry.summary: It's always interesting to see what one keeps when they purge a room, house, or garage for whatever reason. Before I do any of that, i ask my kids to see if they want anything - you never know what odd thing contains a vivid memory for someone else.
entry.content: It's always interesting to see what one keeps when they purge a room, house, or garage for whatever reason. Before I do any of that, i ask my kids to see if they want anything - you never know what odd thing contains a vivid memory for someone else.

entry.title: I enjoyed reading about the lock, how interesting!...
entry.summary: I enjoyed reading about the lock, how interesting! When I was a kid, we vacationed in Northern Michigan and we always made a point to visit the Soo Locks (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soo_locks)in the St. Mary's River. It amazed me the way Mother Nature was circumvented and …
entry.content:
I enjoyed reading about the lock, how interesting! When I was a kid, we vacationed in Northern Michigan and we always made a point to visit the Soo Locks (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soo_locks)in the St. Mary's River. It amazed me the way Mother Nature was circumvented and that those huge ore boats could be traverse what used to be rapids.

Love the picture of the shop in Mells, very quaint - and it's a Post Office, too!
